Special Envoy of Chinese President Here

articles.content:
Special Envoy of Chinese President Here 
   Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Tang Jiaxuan, state councilor who is a special envoy of Chinese President Hu Jintao, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, arrived here by special plane on Wednesday.
 He was accompanied by Dai Bingguo, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the CPC who is also executive vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Wu Dawei, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and others.    
 He was greeted at the airport by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador e. p. to the DPRK.

articles.title: Important Days in DPRK Observed
Foreign Figures Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
articles.content:
Foreign Figures Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies 
   Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leaders of political parties and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in their capital cities from Oct. 10 to 13 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 Among them were leaders and representatives of different political parties including the Communist Party, the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Socialist Party, the National Socialist Party, Workers' Party and the People's League of Bangladesh, the vice-chairman of the Malaysia Chinese Association who is vice-minister of Higher Education, the director of the M.K.P. Company and the general director of a tourist company of Malaysia, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairperson of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia and the chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea.    
 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their full-length picture before paying tribute to them.

Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions in Different Countries 
   Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Political parties, ministries, organizations, institutions and people of various circles in different countries presented floral baskets to DPRK missions in their capital cities from Oct. 10 to 13 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 Among them were the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party, the Ministry of Defence and the Central Committee of the National Front of Vietnam, the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Kindergarten, and the Ministry of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics of Iran and the "Iranian Workers' House", the Central Committee of the People's Party and the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, the Senat Ship and Trading Private Limited Co. of Singapore and the chairman of the Proletarian and Islamic Revolutionary Wounded Organization of Iran.

articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the International Committee of Red Cross (ICRC) and Juan Manuel Suarez del Toro, president of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies (IFRCS), on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the DPRK Red Cross Society.
  They were handed to an official concerned by the heads of the ICRC and IFRCS delegations on visit to the DPRK.
